meaningMnemonic: When your <kanji>chest</kanji> is <kanji>burn</kanji>ing, you have what's known as <vocabulary>heartburn</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The readings are the kun'yomi vocab readings (hint is that there's hiragana sticking out there). So, just make sure you know the word 胸 and 焼く. If you do, you can combine that knowledge into this word, and hopefully not get any heartburn in the process.
